description:
A versatile and comfy top that makes packing for a weekend away, that much easier. On the trail, on the slopes, or in the cabin, you’ll appreciate this top’s lightweight warmth.

  • Fine gauge merino yarns (17.6 micron) are super-soft and feel great against your skin
  • Midweight material works well on its own or as part of your layering system
  • Biodegradable merino wool reduces waste when you’re done with the garment
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabrics add confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
name: Bonnetier Basic Luxe Merino Long Sleeve - Women's
